summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NICU Fluid Calculator application. All core functionality working correctly including landing page navigation, theme toggle, patient information inputs, fluid calculations, and edge case handling.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (/api/, /api/status) - all working correctly
Landing page loads with FluidCal header
NICU section clickable and navigates to /nicu
Children section shows 'Coming Soon' and is disabled
Theme toggle works on both landing and calculator pages
Back button navigation from calculator to landing page
Patient information inputs (weight, age, gestational age)
TFI suggestion appears based on age input
Fluid type selection (D10% alone, D10% + D50%)
3% NaCl checkbox and amount input functionality
Reset calculator functionality clears all inputs
Warning message displays when deductions exceed TFI

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components, navigation, calculations, and edge cases working correctly
